bm:
Ap build for high Def Bosses
**Black manta G70**
Dmg Dealer
Artifact recommended is Claw of Horus. If you use all blades, you’ll have to to multiple tags. So bm passive 1 will reset after 9 seconds of not landing any hit.

Gear 2: FAC FAC FAC

(Since Bm always goes with Brnc, Health = 89491)

aaam:
AAAM - Atlantean Armor Aquaman G70
Attack build
Since all opponents now have max resist we only have atk effects. Besides this, his passive does not consider CAC & CAD for healing. Pair with jsgl and akbm or jsgl and hsc if you use sp2 more than sp1!

PAIR WITH ALL BLADES AND SEE THE Magic.

Gear 1: Atk Atk Atk
Gear 2: Atk Atk Atk
Gear 3: Atk Atk Atk
Gear 4: Atk Atk Health
Gear 5: Health Health Health

Talent 1: Resist
Talent 2: Resist
Talent 3: Resist
Talent 4: Def
Talent 5: Def
Talent 6: Def

TTV     ?
Attack     5712 (Healing = 8568)
Health     33008
Defense    70
CAD        150
CAC        24
FAC        1
Stun resist   60
DOT resist    60
CAC resist    60
Healing = 1.5x atk stat(CAC , CAD not included)
AAAM can act as a great combo builder when paired with BA & Df on p4.
His combo has perfect timing and reach just like koaam. You can have above 60% FAC if needed!

DOT resist    60
CAC resist    70
More atk= More healing.
This build works for other game modes flawlessly.
Use Tab or claw on her and meta on sacrificing character to increase healing.
Epi is just a healing support and not a dmg dealer. T8 GG supermove removes around 25k health (22k-28k cause of his dmg buff perk) for an epi with max def. Hence anything above 30k health is OK.
